text: Marius Chelaru (born 2 March 1997) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays for Liga III club Aerostar Bacău as a midfielder. == Club career == === Politehnica Iași === In the sumer of 2017, after helping CS Știința Miroslava secure promotion to the Romanian Liga II, Chelaru returned to Politehnica Iași, and subsequently signed a new contract that will keep him at the team until the summer of 2020. Helped by the fact that Liga I teams had to play a home grown youth player, Chelaru established himself as a starter under manager Flavius Stoican, in the 2017–18 season. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="3"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="6" valign="center"|Politehnica Iași |- |2016–17 |4||0||1||0||rowspan=1 colspan="2"|–||5||0 |- |2017–18 |20||1||3||0||rowspan=1 colspan="2"|–||23||1 |- |2018–19 |10||0||1||0||rowspan=1 colspan="2"|–||11||0 |- |2019–20 |4||0||0||0||rowspan=1 colspan="2"|–||4||0 |- !Total !38!!1!!5!!0!!rowspan=1 colspan="2"|–!!43!!1 |- !colspan="2"|Career total !38||1||5||0||rowspan=1 colspan="2"|–||43||1 |} ==Honours== ===Știința Miroslava=== *Liga III: 2016–17 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Politehnica Iași (2010) players Category:CS Știința Miroslava players Category:CS Aerostar Bacău players
